attributes.action: We oppose Model Standards 2008 for Caravan Site in England
attributes.additional_details:
We oppose Model Standards 2008 for Caravan Site in England.
Our concerns are as follow's : The Standards - 2. Density, Spacing and Parking Between Caravans.
Section (F) Fences and Hedges, where allowed and forming the boundary between adjacent caravans, should be a maximum of 1 metre high.
This will effect our basic right to secure our property and allow privacy to be invaded.
